[docs]def require_root(fn):
    """
    Decorator to make sure, that user is root.
    """
    @wraps(fn)
    def xex(*args, **kwargs):
        assert os.geteuid() == 0, \
            "You have to be root to run function '%s'." % fn.__name__
        return fn(*args, **kwargs)

    return xex



@require_root
